page.title: 16Forest Hill church
page.content: The vicar at Forest Hill church is also the vicar at Stanton St John and Wheatley. In the graveyard at the church the headstones are at the side. This happens when all the family has died off. This is done to make it easy to look after. This graveyard is around the church but sometimes it is away from the church. The churchyard is now full and 2 other sites are used. The main part of the church is Norman and years later parts were added. The roof needs repairing because of weather damage. The cost will be about 30 to 40,000 pounds. There are 2 bells. The font is quite recent as the other one was stolen. 20 to 25 people go to church on Sundays. In 1984 there were 11 baptisms, 1 confirmation, 6 weddings and 5 funerals.
